mapper.select: select id, chain_code, chain_name, ty_master_xw_code, ty_master_xw_name, ty_master_empsn, ty_master_empname, ty_region_code, cd_master_xw_code, cd_master_xw_name, cd_master_empsn, cd_master_empname, contracts_id, create_date, ty_chain_percents, cd_chain_percents, market_percents, net_percents, plan_setps, share_setps, chain_pt_code, deleted from chain_contract.z_hr_chain_info where id = #{id}

select id, chain_code, chain_name, ty_master_xw_code, ty_master_xw_name, ty_master_empsn, ty_master_empname, ty_region_code, cd_master_xw_code, cd_master_xw_name, cd_master_empsn, cd_master_empname, contracts_id, create_date, ty_chain_percents, cd_chain_percents, market_percents, net_percents, plan_setps, share_setps, chain_pt_code, deleted from chain_contract.z_hr_chain_info limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into chain_contract.z_hr_chain_info(chain_code, chain_name, ty_master_xw_code, ty_master_xw_name, ty_master_empsn, ty_master_empname, ty_region_code, cd_master_xw_code, cd_master_xw_name, cd_master_empsn, cd_master_empname, contracts_id, create_date, ty_chain_percents, cd_chain_percents, market_percents, net_percents, plan_setps, share_setps, chain_pt_code, deleted) values (#{chainCode}, #{chainName}, #{tyMasterXwCode}, #{tyMasterXwName}, #{tyMasterEmpsn}, #{tyMasterEmpname}, #{tyRegionCode}, #{cdMasterXwCode}, #{cdMasterXwName}, #{cdMasterEmpsn}, #{cdMasterEmpname}, #{contractsId}, #{createDate}, #{tyChainPercents}, #{cdChainPercents}, #{marketPercents}, #{netPercents}, #{planSetps}, #{shareSetps}, #{chainPtCode}, #{deleted})
mapper.update:
update chain_contract.z_hr_chain_info
chain_code = #{chainCode},
chain_name = #{chainName},
ty_master_xw_code = #{tyMasterXwCode},
ty_master_xw_name = #{tyMasterXwName},
ty_master_empsn = #{tyMasterEmpsn},
ty_master_empname = #{tyMasterEmpname},
ty_region_code = #{tyRegionCode},
cd_master_xw_code = #{cdMasterXwCode},
cd_master_xw_name = #{cdMasterXwName},
cd_master_empsn = #{cdMasterEmpsn},
cd_master_empname = #{cdMasterEmpname},
contracts_id = #{contractsId},
create_date = #{createDate},
ty_chain_percents = #{tyChainPercents},
cd_chain_percents = #{cdChainPercents},
market_percents = #{marketPercents},
net_percents = #{netPercents},
plan_setps = #{planSetps},
share_setps = #{shareSetps},
chain_pt_code = #{chainPtCode},
deleted = #{deleted},
where id = #{id}
